WorkItem.Description: Has there been any discussion about adding this functionality?  This would make adding photos much easier.

Comments.Message: This functionality is also present in the Personal Starter kit. Looks like it is the easiest to just copied it from there
Copying is no fun... we should do something cooler.
Bulk upload to file system rather than DB would be GREAT!
MarValUS, we already have the ability to store on the file system. Take a look at the latest changesets.
Can someone point me to what they want for this? I don't really know how you want this displayed or if this can just be resolved with adding in AJAX functionality.

Zach,  Jeremy Wadsworth has this feture in his persoanl Starter kit that I use for a photographer friend of mine.  The code can be downloaded at www.jeremywadsworth.com.  This code allows you to bulk upload photos to the site, then add them to an album from that point.
I have Jeremy's code. I will go take a look. Thanks for pointing me in that direction.

Hi. 

I have been trying to use the bulk upload feature but I cannot find out where to put the pictures for uploading.  Even on the Bulk Upload screen the prompt is only allowing the selection of one file.  Am I missing something here?
